panels.description: Average duration of garbage collection pauses caused by the JVM garbage collector.
panels.title: Average GC Pause Duration

panels.description: Average amount of memory allocated by the JVM garbage collector.
panels.title: Average GC Memory Allocation

panels.description: Number of connections in the transactional connection pool.
panels.title: Database Connections: Transactional

panels.description: Number of connections in the non-transactional connection pool.
panels.title: Database Connections: Non-Transactional

panels.description: Average number of database operations per second.
panels.title: Database Operations

panels.description: Average number of database queries per second.
panels.title: Database Queries

panels.description: Average number of database transactions per second.
panels.title: Database Transactions

panels.description: Average time it takes for a thread to acquire a connection from the database connection pool.
panels.title: Average Connection Acquisition Duration

panels.description: Average time of connections being used before being returned to the connection pool.
panels.title: Average Connection Usage Duration

panels.description: Average time it takes to create a new database connection.
panels.title: Average Connection Creation Duration

panels.description: Total number of entries in the caches used by the object relational mapper (ORM).
panels.title: ORM Cache Entries

panels.description: Number of events processed per second.
panels.title: Events Processed

panels.description: Total number of events queued for processing.
panels.title: Events Queued

panels.description: Number of active threads per worker pool.
panels.title: Active Worker Threads

panels.description: Average number of events published per second.
panels.title: Events Published

panels.description: Number of notifications processed per second.
panels.title: Notifications Processed

panels.description: Total number of notifications queued for processing.
panels.title: Notifications Queued

panels.description: Number of active threads per worker pool.
panels.title: Active Worker Threads

panels.description: Average number of events published per second. Note that this includes ALL notifications, even those for which no alert was configured.
panels.title: Notifications Published

panels.description: Average time taken to analyze the repository metadata for all components in a project.
panels.title: Average Repository Metadata Analysis Duration

panels.description: Average time taken to rebuild Lucene search indexes, per index type.
panels.title: Average Search Index Rebuild Duration

panels.description:
Average number of retries against the Sonatype OSS Index API.

Note: If OSS Index is not enabled, no data will be displayed.
panels.title: Retries: Sonatype OSS Index API

panels.description:
Average number of retries against the Snyk API.

Note: If Snyk is not enabled, no data will be displayed.
panels.title: Retries: Snyk
